alert.note: Alert for Braxton; Nicholas; Webster (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 2:53PM EDT until July 13 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Nicholas County in southeastern West Virginia... Southeastern Braxton County in north central West Virginia... Central Webster County in northeastern West Virginia... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 252 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Birch River, or 12 miles south of Sutton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Webster Springs, Addison (Webster Springs), Cowen, Boggs, Diana, Upper Glade and Erbacon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
